personalInfo.name: Mohanad Ba Mehriz
personalInfo.title: Software Engineering Student
personalInfo.aboutMe:
Passionate Software Engineering student. 
Skilled in multiple programming languages and frameworks,
I enjoy building innovative solutions and contributing to impactful projects.

recentProjects.title: WeCourses Website
recentProjects.description:
Developed a web application for tracking courses. 
 Collabrated with my teammate to design and implement interactive features that improved usability, including course progress tracking and a clean, responsive user interface.

recentProjects.title: CimaTick Mobile App
recentProjects.description: As part of a team project with my classmates, I developed a Flutter & Firebase-based mobile application for booking cinema tickets. The app streamlines the entire user experience from browsing movies and selecting showtimes and seats, to securing tickets in real time.

recentProjects.title: Hospital System
recentProjects.description: Collaborated with teammates to develop a hospital management system using ASP.NET and C#, The system includes patient registration, appointment scheduling, and an administrative dashboard for real-time management.
